Class MavenBuildInfo

java.lang.Object
org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.buildinfo.MavenBuildInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuildInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoreUtilsBuildInfo
public class MavenBuildInfo extends Object implements BuildInfo
Implementation of BuildInfo with build-information that is loaded from properties-file, that is expected to be at classpath as a resource with path: 
/META-INF/maven/'project-group'/'project-artifact'/maven-project.properties
... where
  • 'project-group' - maven-project group
  • 'project-artifact' - maven-project artifact

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MavenBuildInfo(String mavenProjectGroup, String mavenProjectArtifact)
    Loading the build-information from properties-file, whose resource-path depends on passed mavenProjectGroup and mavenProjectArtifact

      Loading the build-information from properties-file, whose resource-path depends on passed mavenProjectGroup and mavenProjectArtifact
      Parameters:
      mavenProjectGroup - maven-project group (<groupId>-tag in pom.xml of maven-project)
      mavenProjectArtifact - maven-project artifact (<artifactId>-tag in pom.xml of maven-project)
